title: Knowledge Base Entry
description: Entry in the WebCompat Knowledge Base

title.description: Single-sentence title summarizing the issues cause

severity.description: Estimation of how severe this issue is

user_base_impact.description: Estimation of how many users are affected

tags.description: List of tags to attached to this issue

symptoms.description: List of strings that describe how this bug manifests

console_messages.description: List of Developer Tools console messages associated with this issue

solutions.description: Collection of information on how this can be solved

interventions.description: List of URLs to interventions that are shipping or have been shipping. Link to the code in the GitHub repository, and use the canonical URLs to ensure persistance over time

notes.description: List of notes about previous solving attempts, etc

workarounds.description: List of descriptions of how web developers can work around the issue

references.description: Collection of references related to this issue

breakage.description: List of URLs to issues where actual site breakage is tracked. If available, point the link directly to a comment with clear STR

platform_issues.description: List of URLs to issues tracking the underlying platform issue

telemetry.description: List of URLs pointing to telemetry data indicating how widespread this issue is. Link to Use Counters etc

testcases.description: List of URLs to testcases, or path to a directory inside this repository
